00057 OutputDevice::DeviceMap OutputDevice::myOutputDevices;

00059 
00060 // ===========================================================================
00061 // static method definitions
00062 // ===========================================================================
00063 OutputDevice&
00064 OutputDevice::getDevice(const std::string& name,
00065                         const std::string& base) {
00066     // check whether the device has already been aqcuired
00067     if (myOutputDevices.find(name) != myOutputDevices.end()) {
00068         return *myOutputDevices[name];
00069     }
00070     // build the device
00071     OutputDevice* dev = 0;
00072     // check whether the device shall print to stdout
00073     if (name == "stdout" || name == "-") {
00074         dev = new OutputDevice_COUT();
00075     } else if (FileHelpers::isSocket(name)) {
00076         try {
00077             int port = TplConvert<char>::_2int(name.substr(name.find(":") + 1).c_str());
00078             dev = new OutputDevice_Network(name.substr(0, name.find(":")), port);
00079         } catch (NumberFormatException&) {
00080             throw IOError("Given port number '" + name.substr(name.find(":") + 1) + "' is not numeric.");
00081         } catch (EmptyData&) {
00082             throw IOError("No port number given.");
00083         }
00084     } else {
00085         dev = new OutputDevice_File(FileHelpers::checkForRelativity(name, base));
00086     }
00087     dev->setPrecision();
00088     dev->getOStream() << std::setiosflags(std::ios::fixed);
00089     myOutputDevices[name] = dev;
00090     return *dev;
00091 }
00092 
00093 
00094 bool
00095 OutputDevice::createDeviceByOption(const std::string& optionName,
00096                                    const std::string& rootElement) {
00097     if (!OptionsCont::getOptions().isSet(optionName)) {
00098         return false;
00099     }
00100     OutputDevice& dev = OutputDevice::getDevice(OptionsCont::getOptions().getString(optionName));
00101     if (rootElement != "") {
00102         dev.writeXMLHeader(rootElement);
00103     }
00104     return true;
00105 }
00106 
00107 
00108 OutputDevice&
00109 OutputDevice::getDeviceByOption(const std::string& optionName) throw(IOError, InvalidArgument) {
00110     std::string devName = OptionsCont::getOptions().getString(optionName);
00111     if (myOutputDevices.find(devName) == myOutputDevices.end()) {
00112         throw InvalidArgument("Device '" + devName + "' has not been created.");
00113     }
00114     return OutputDevice::getDevice(devName);
00115 }
00116 
00117 
00118 void
00119 OutputDevice::closeAll() {
00120     while (myOutputDevices.size() != 0) {
00121         myOutputDevices.begin()->second->close();
00122     }
00123     myOutputDevices.clear();
00124 }
00125 
00126 
00127 std::string
00128 OutputDevice::realString(const SUMOReal v, const int precision) {
00129     std::ostringstream oss;
00130     if (v == 0) {
00131         return "0";
00132     }
00133     if (v < pow(10., -precision)) {
00134         oss.setf(std::ios::scientific, std::ios::floatfield);
00135     } else {
00136         oss.setf(std::ios::fixed , std::ios::floatfield);    // use decimal format
00137         oss.setf(std::ios::showpoint);    // print decimal point
00138         oss << std::setprecision(precision);
00139     }
00140     oss << v;
00141     return oss.str();
00142 }

00148 OutputDevice::OutputDevice(const unsigned int defaultIndentation)
00149     : myDefaultIndentation(defaultIndentation) {

00152 
00153 bool
00154 OutputDevice::ok() {
00155     return getOStream().good();
00156 }
00157 
00158 
00159 void
00160 OutputDevice::close() {
00161     while (closeTag()) {}
00162     for (DeviceMap::iterator i = myOutputDevices.begin(); i != myOutputDevices.end(); ++i) {
00163         if (i->second == this) {
00164             myOutputDevices.erase(i);
00165             break;
00166         }
00167     }
00168     delete this;
00169 }
00170 
00171 
00172 void
00173 OutputDevice::setPrecision(unsigned int precision) {
00174     getOStream() << std::setprecision(precision);
00175 }
00176 
00177 
00178 bool
00179 OutputDevice::writeXMLHeader(const std::string& rootElement, const std::string xmlParams,
00180                              const std::string& attrs, const std::string& comment) {
00181     if (myXMLStack.empty()) {
00182         OptionsCont::getOptions().writeXMLHeader(getOStream(), xmlParams);
00183         if (comment != "") {
00184             getOStream() << comment << "\n";
00185         }
00186         openTag(rootElement);
00187         if (attrs != "") {
00188             getOStream() << " " << attrs;
00189         }
00190         getOStream() << ">\n";
00191         return true;
00192     }
00193     return false;
00194 }
00195 
00196 
00197 OutputDevice&
00198 OutputDevice::indent() {
00199     getOStream() << std::string(4 * (myXMLStack.size() + myDefaultIndentation), ' ');
00200     postWriteHook();
00201     return *this;
00202 }
00203 
00204 
00205 OutputDevice&
00206 OutputDevice::openTag(const std::string& xmlElement) {
00207     getOStream() << std::string(4 * (myXMLStack.size() + myDefaultIndentation), ' ') << "<" << xmlElement;
00208     postWriteHook();
00209     myXMLStack.push_back(xmlElement);
00210     return *this;
00211 }
00212 
00213 
00214 OutputDevice&
00215 OutputDevice::openTag(const SumoXMLTag& xmlElement) {
00216     return openTag(toString(xmlElement));
00217 }
00218 
00219 
00220 bool
00221 OutputDevice::closeTag(bool abbreviated) {
00222     if (!myXMLStack.empty()) {
00223         if (abbreviated) {
00224             getOStream() << "/>" << std::endl;
00225         } else {
00226             std::string indent(4 * (myXMLStack.size() + myDefaultIndentation - 1), ' ');
00227             getOStream() << indent << "</" << myXMLStack.back() << ">" << std::endl;
00228         }
00229         myXMLStack.pop_back();
00230         postWriteHook();
00231         return true;
00232     }
00233     return false;
00234 }
00235 
00236 
00237 void
00238 OutputDevice::postWriteHook() {}
00239 
00240 
00241 void
00242 OutputDevice::inform(const std::string& msg) {
00243     getOStream() << msg << '\n';
00244     postWriteHook();
00245 }

00247 
00248 OutputDevice& 
00249 OutputDevice::writeAttr(std::string attr, std::string val) {
00250     getOStream() << " " << attr << "=\"" << val << "\"";
00251     return *this;
00252 }
